title: Ultimate Converter
description: The ultimate tool to convert your files and download medias from web !
Convert images, videos, vectors, audios and archive files easily in a wide range of formats. No ads, no scam, just works !

title: Square Game
description: SQUARE GAME is a game developed in C using GTK for the graphical user interface.
It features both local multiplayer and AI-based gameplay modes, allowing players to compete against each other or challenge an AI opponent.

title: FindWord
description: Discover FindWord, the online mini-game where you try to match your friends' intuition!
In an oceanic universe, try to increase your relationships with as many people as possible. Available only in french !

title: Kaboom
description: An online multiplayer video game developed entirely in Python with PyQT5.
Find a word containing the syllable displayed on the screen before the bomb explodes! Be careful, you don't know the time limit!

title: Streaming Power
description: Streamingpower is the new streaming site! A major update is on the way, so get ready!
In a retro style, you'll be able to watch your favorite films and series in top quality!
